page.title: 04MY DAYS AS ROSE QUEEN
page.content: I was elected as the 1985 Rose Queen; I had beaten Lorraine Tatman by only two points and she and Elizabeth Short were my two attendants. In the morning I was very excited. Mum got my sister ready and then I got ready. When I was ready Mum took some photos of us in the garden and then Dad helped me into the car and we went down to the farm next to our school. We went up to the gate and I did not recognise Lorraine and Elizabeth, all in pink. We were very nervous but excited. We went to to the front of the carnival. A man from the paper interviewed us and took some photos and then the carnival started. After the carnival I gave my speech and I was welcomed by Viscount Althorp with a kiss. Then I went round to talk to the children and and the old people. {I really enjoyed my days as Rose Queen.}
